thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lupin Ltd Qtrly Performance Muted On Back Of Business Mix, Forex Losses

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lupin Ltd Qtrly Performance Muted On Back Of Business Mix, Forex Losses
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Lupin Ltd:
* SAYS QTRLY PERFORMANCE WAS MUTED ON BACK OF BUSINESS MIX AS WELL AS FOREX LOSSES
* SAYS U.S. BUSINESS IS NOW STARTING TO STABILIZE AT THE CURRENT LEVEL
* NEAR-TERM PRIORITIES TO COMMERCIALIZE SOLOSEC, RESOLVE WARNING LETTER ON GOA AND INDORE UNIT 2
* LUPIN - Q3 NET PROFIT INCLUDES IMPACT OF 361 MILLION RUPEES ON ACCOUNT OF REMEASUREMENT OF DEFERRED TAX ASSETS/LIABILITIES PERTAINING TO US OPERATIONS Source text - bit.ly/2BZ66Yu Further company coverage:
